query.mssql:
WITH CTE AS ( select e.Id, e.Name as DocumentName, FORMAT(e.AccDate_Docflow_Sungero, 'yyyy-MM-dd') as AccDate, e.AccNumber_Docflow_Sungero as Number, m.Name as MVZ_MVP, a.Name as AccArt, s.Name as ProductName, e.ContrTypeBaseS_SBContr_sberdev as Contrtype, r.Name as Conterparty, e.AccTotalAmount_Docflow_Sungero as Amount from Sungero_Content_EDoc e left join sberdev_SBContr_AccountingDocu p on e.Id = p.EDoc inner join sberdev_SberCon_ProductsAndDev s on p.Product = s.Id left join sberdev_SberCon_MVZ m on e.MVZBaseSberDev_SBContr_sberdev = m.Id or e.MVPBaseSberDev_SBContr_sberdev = m.Id left join sberdev_SberCon_AccountingArti a on e.AccArtBaseSber_SBContr_sberdev = a.Id left join Sungero_Parties_Counterparty r on e.AccCParty_Docflow_Sungero = r.Id where e.Discriminator = 'A523A263-BC00-40F9-810D-F582BAE2205D' and e.HasVersions = 1 and e.LifeCycleState_Docflow_Sungero = 'Paid' and e.Created >= @startDate and e.Created <= @endDate and e.ContrTypeBaseS_SBContr_sberdev = @type)
select distinct Id, DocumentName, Contrtype, MVZ_MVP, AccArt, stuff(( select concat(',',ProductName) from CTE where Id=t.Id order by ProductName for XML path('') ),1,1,'') ProductName, AccDate, Number, Conterparty, Amount from CTE t
